import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AppContext } from "../context/Context"; import Location from "./Location"; import Category from "./Category"; const Card = ({ name, country_id, connected_social, gender, category, followers, joiningDate, url, }) => { const { themeMode } = useContext(AppContext); console.log(connected_social) return (

{name}

Joined On: {joiningDate}

{followers}

Followers

{/* {category} */}

Categories

{gender}

Gender

); }; export default Card;
